description.attr1: As part of their conversions, persons commonly referred to as Stubs are outfitted with the ability to receive ship sensor data into their optical systems. This results in seeing objects in the void as if a constant and infinite light source is originating from the optic perspective.

If you are a Stub that has the desire to be experience a more human perspective, this upgrade alters sensor readings to approximate a more realistic light source. Which in this part of space is the Sun Gate.
